forecast.day_comments: Snow.  High near 25. Light northwest wind.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly before 9pm.  Low around 17. Calm wind becoming north around 6 mph in the evening.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of around an inch possible.
